description: AI-powered LinkedIn content generation system with Clerk authentication and Supabase database
objectives: Enable users to generate LinkedIn content with AI assistance
Provide user onboarding and profile management
Integrate with LinkedIn API for content publishing

requirements.title: System Health Check
requirements.description: The system must provide a health check endpoint to verify system status
acceptanceCriteria: Health endpoint returns status of all services
Health check includes API, Clerk, and Supabase status

requirements.title: User Authentication
requirements.description: The system must authenticate users using Clerk JWT tokens
acceptanceCriteria: Users must provide valid JWT token for authenticated endpoints
Invalid tokens are rejected with 401 status
Users are created in Supabase upon authentication

requirements.title: User Onboarding
requirements.description: New users must complete an onboarding questionnaire
acceptanceCriteria: User profile is created from questionnaire responses
Onboarding status is tracked in database

requirements.title: Content Generation
requirements.description: Users can generate LinkedIn posts based on topics
acceptanceCriteria: Posts are generated based on user topic and profile
Generated posts are saved as drafts
Posts can be retrieved by status (draft/published)

requirements.title: LinkedIn Integration
requirements.description: Users can connect their LinkedIn account
acceptanceCriteria: LinkedIn OAuth tokens can be stored
LinkedIn connection status can be checked
Tokens are securely stored for later use
